eisy¶

eisy is a Python module for simulating and classifying impedance data.

Using circuit elements, the simulation module is able to reproduce the impedance response of the selected circuit. Look into the circuit.py page to see which configurations are already supported. The data_simulation.py module allows to simulate the response and saves the result in a pandas.DataFrame in the frequency domain. The impedance response is presented both in its complex form, as well as separated in its real and imaginary parts.

Note

eisy is a new Python model and will be continuously updated as more feature are developed.

For any suggestions or request for specific features, plese visit the eisy issue page
